body:
Comment 2 by **simonedichiara@maior.biz**: 
Since the instructions only say: 

  You can also run it locally. First install Go and then use go to install gotour:
  go get code.google.com/p/go-tour/gotour
  and run the gotour executable. 

I didn't have done this: C:\a\code\src\code.google.com\p\go-tour\gotour>go build -v. And
that way it didn't work for me. 

As you described, it works. Thank you.

I think this http://code.google.com/p/go-tour/issues/detail?id=33 is a similar problem.
